speaker: Damp Sign
text: Don't step on the flower, you rotting wretch!

speaker: Player
text: I'm alive as one could be! Can't you see? A corpse could never look this handsome.

speaker: Damp Sign
text: You're human alright. Only they are could be so vain and loud

speaker: Damp Sign
text: Whatever. If ya gonna go to the graveyard, watch out, tough no necessarily the most powerful of the monster one can meet, they more than make that up with their numbers

speaker: Damp Sign
text: If ya want to avoid them, go next to the graves. It seems to be some kind of consecrated grounds, so the undead don't go there.

speaker: Player
text: If so, why are there undead here in the first place?

speaker: Damp Sign
text: Why should I know? And why should you care? All you're here for is to prove yourself anyway, no?

speaker: Damp Sign
text: And if that's the case, all you need to do is find 2 vampire underlings in a secluded area with a well and weeping willo, kill them and do the some with their bosses: two elder and a single true blood vampire in a clearing in the rightmost part of the graveyard.

speaker: Damp Sign
text: Then you can go to the castle, the last possible stop for a fool, such as yourself, who tries to prov their 'might' or whatever.

speaker: Damp Sign
text: Now off you go. Don't linger or I won't be able to nap

speaker: Player
text: Thanks, but you seriously should work on your attitude. Bye!
